header.title: DSA & System Design Bootcamp
header.desc: FAANG instructor’s blended learning course with video lessons and live doubt sessions and live project sessions to crack Software Developer interview in any product base company.
header.firstPoint: DSA: Arrays, Sorting, Trees, DP, Linked Lists, Graphs, Advanced Structures.
header.secondPoint: System Design: Intro, Scalability, API, Load Balancer, HLD, LLD.
header.thirdPoint: Advanced DSA: LRU Cache, Adv. Trees, DP Optimization.
header.fourthPoint: Design Components: Storage, Cache, CDN, Load Balancer, Scalability, Queues, CAP Theorem.

Module0.title: Module 1 - Data Structures and Algorithms
Module0.desc: This module helps you to master the algorithms and data structures interview in FAANG & top product based MNCs. You will be solving 250+ coding challenges under guidance of expert mentors working in Tier 1 companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe, Facebook, Google etc.

desc: Array basics, Problem solving techniques with example

chap.title: Chapter 1: System Design fundamentals
desc: OOD : Object-oriented analysis and design , Design patterns
CAP Theorem in distributed Computer Systems
Load balancing - Caching - Distributed And Global Cache
Database Indexing, Sharding, Normalization, ACID, SQL vs NoSQL

chap.title: Chapter 2: High Level Design With Projects
desc: Introduction to common MicroService design patterns
Microservices & System components in real world
Event Driven, Domain Driven, Rest API driven Architectures

chap.title: Chapter 3: Low Level Design With Projects
desc: DB Schema Design for NoSQL and SQL
Common LLD and API design questions
Advance Tree - Segment tree, Suffix tree, Red black tree, K-D tree
Solve 30+ hard level coding interview questions from FAANG companies.

FaqDATA.ques: Is this an Advanced level or beginner level course?
FaqDATA.ans: This a basic to advanced level course that is designed in collaboration with Senior FAANG Software Developers to make you interview-ready for Software Developer jobs in any product-based company. Each module is taught in detail by Software Developers from FAANG to give you in-depth knowledge along with problem-solving approach. Note the content of this course is not static, which means the lessons are updated frequently with current topics & new interview problems in the field of Software Development interview.

FaqDATA.ques: Can a fresher do this course?
FaqDATA.ans: This course is designed to meet the needs of both experienced software developers working in service-based companies and college goers/fresh graduates who aspire to be a software developer in a product-based company, This course provides comprehensive coverage of topics across all levels - from basic to advanced.

FaqDATA.ques: How can I enroll in this course?
FaqDATA.ans: Click on 'Start Learning' on this page. Then click on 'Buy Now'. Fill up your details and click on 'Pay Securely'. Complete the payment process on our Razorpay platform and start your Software Developer journey for product-based companies. Note: the payment gateway system is encrypted by Razorpay, hence making it safe and compliant with all banks and financial institutes across the globe.

FaqDATA.ques: How can I get my doubts cleared?
FaqDATA.ans: Every weekend we conduct Trainer-led live clearing sessions where you can unmute and ask your doubts. You can attend unlimited doubt sessions for the next 2 years.

FaqDATA.ques: How will I do projects / problem-solving questions?
FaqDATA.ans: Every weekend we conduct Trainer-led live project sessions, where projects mentioned above on this page will be done live in the class. Note: Apart from the mentioned projects, we will also do various problem-solving questions that are asked in the SDE interview.

FaqDATA.ques: Is it a recorded course or live course?
FaqDATA.ans: All lessons are recorded, live classes only for doubt-clearing and project/interview-problems sessions

FaqDATA.ques: How soon can I complete the course?
FaqDATA.ans: This course offers 76 hrs of recorded lessons which you can do at your own pace, on average it takes 2 months to complete. Where you will have access to all recorded lessons for lifetime and live doubt & project/interview-problems sessions for the next 2 years from the date of purchase.

Yes, this course has a refund policy. You can take the refund within 15 days from the purchase date of the product and the course should not be accessed by more than 10%. With no questions ask policy.

FaqDATA.ques: Can I access this course on mobile and tablet?
FaqDATA.ans: Absolutely! Our device-friendly platform allows you to access and learn from our courses on various devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, or desktops.

FaqDATA.ques: Is there any validity of the course
FaqDATA.ans: Once you enroll you have lifetime access to the course content.
